about.title: About Our Church
about.subtitle: Serving our community with faith, love, and compassion since 1995

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: At Църква Емануил, our mission is to share God's love with our community and beyond. We strive to create a welcoming environment where people from all walks of life can experience spiritual growth, healing, and community.
mission.p2: We are committed to serving others, spreading the gospel, and making a positive impact in our neighborhood and throughout the world.

history.title: Our History
history.p1: Founded in 1995, our church began as a small gathering in a living room with just a handful of devoted members. Over the years, we've grown into a vibrant community of believers.
history.p2: Throughout our history, we've remained committed to our founding principles while adapting to meet the changing needs of our congregation and community.

team.title: Our Leadership Team
team.intro: Meet the dedicated individuals who guide our church community with wisdom, compassion, and vision.

love.title: Love
love.description: We believe in showing God's love to all people without condition.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive community where everyone belongs and grows together.

scripture.title: Scripture
scripture.description: We are rooted in Biblical teaching as our guide for faith and practice.

service.title: Service
service.description: We are called to serve others following Christ's example of selfless love.

cta.title: Join Us This Sunday
cta.text: We'd love to welcome you to our church family. Come experience worship, fellowship, and spiritual growth with us.

kids.title: Kids Ministry
kids.subtitle: Where faith, fun, and friendship come together!

intro.title: Welcome to Our Kids Ministry
intro.description1: Our kids ministry is a vibrant, fun, and safe place where children learn about God's love through engaging activities, Bible lessons, and meaningful relationships.
intro.description2: We believe that children are an important part of our church family, and we're committed to helping them grow in their faith in age-appropriate ways.

gallery.title: This Week's Activities
gallery.description: Take a look at the fun and learning our kids experienced this week!

0.title: Bible Story Time
0.description: Learning about the good Samaritan and helping others.

1.title: Art & Crafts
1.description: Creating beautiful artwork to express our faith.

2.title: Worship & Music
2.description: Praising God with joyful songs and dance.

3.title: Outdoor Games
3.description: Building friendship through fun team activities.

4.title: Group Prayer
4.description: Learning to talk to God and share our hearts.

bible.title: Bible Stories
bible.description: Interactive Bible lessons that bring God's Word to life in ways children can understand and apply.

crafts.title: Creative Arts
crafts.description: Hands-on crafts and activities that help reinforce the lessons and allow kids to express themselves.

games.title: Fun Games
games.description: Engaging games that teach teamwork, build friendships, and create lasting memories.

music.title: Worship & Music
music.description: Lively songs and movements that help children connect with God and express their joy.

sunday.title: Sunday Morning
sunday.description: Kids worship and Bible adventure during the main service.

wednesday.title: Wednesday Evening
wednesday.description: Midweek club with games, Bible lessons, and activities.

special.title: Special Events
special.description: Seasonal celebrations, family fun nights, and more!

team.title: Meet Our Kids Team
team.leader1Description: Passionate about creating engaging experiences for kids to encounter God's love.
team.leader2Description: Dedicated to making each child feel welcome and valued in our church family.
team.leader3Description: Brings creativity and joy to every activity and lesson with the children.

cta.title: Join Us This Sunday!
cta.description: We'd love to welcome your children to our Kids Ministry where they can learn, grow, and have fun in a safe, loving environment.

services.title: Our Church Services
services.subtitle: Join us in worship, prayer, fellowship, and spiritual growth

sunday.title: Sunday Service
sunday.description: Our Sunday services are a time for the whole church family to gather in worship, hear an inspiring message from God's Word, and connect with one another in fellowship. Each service is designed to encourage, challenge, and equip you in your spiritual journey.

midweek.title: Midweek Gatherings
midweek.tagline: Deepen Your Faith During the Week
midweek.description: Our Wednesday evening gatherings offer a more intimate setting for deeper Bible study, prayer, and community building. These services help you apply biblical principles to everyday life and grow closer to God and each other throughout the week.

special.title: Special Services
special.description: Throughout the year, we hold special services to celebrate important occasions in the Christian calendar and in our church life.

communion.title: Communion Service
communion.description: A sacred time to remember Christ's sacrifice through the Lord's Supper together as a church family.

baptism.title: Baptism Service
baptism.description: Celebrate with those who have decided to publicly declare their faith in Jesus Christ.

holiday.title: Holiday Services
holiday.description: Special services during Easter, Christmas, and other significant Christian holidays.

participate.title: How to Participate
participate.description: There are many ways to get involved in our church services. Whether you have musical talents, technical skills, or a heart for hospitality, your gifts can help create a welcoming worship environment.

worship.title: Worship Team
worship.description: Join our worship team as a musician, singer, or technical support person.

volunteer.title: Hospitality Team
volunteer.description: Help create a warm, welcoming environment for everyone attending our services.

prayer.title: Prayer Ministry
prayer.description: Be part of our prayer team, supporting the congregation through prayer.

testimonies.title: Testimonies
testimonies.description: Hear how our services have impacted the lives of our church members.
testimonies.quote1: The Sunday services at Църква Емануил have completely transformed my spiritual life. The worship lifts my soul and the messages speak directly to my heart each week.
testimonies.quote2: I found a true spiritual home in the midweek gatherings. The deep Bible studies and close fellowship have helped me grow in ways I never imagined possible.

cta.title: Join Us This Sunday
cta.text: We'd love to welcome you to our church family. Come experience the love, joy, and peace that comes from worshiping together.

events.title: Church Events
events.subtitle: Connect, grow, and serve with us through our various events and gatherings

featured.label: Featured Event
featured.title: Annual Church Retreat
featured.description: Join us for a weekend of spiritual renewal, fellowship, and fun activities for all ages. This year's theme is 'Growing Together in Faith.'

upcoming.title: Upcoming Events
upcoming.description: Find out what's happening in our church community and join us for these special gatherings.

event1.title: Worship Night
event1.description: An evening dedicated to worship through music and prayer.

event2.title: Bible Study Series
event2.description: Beginning our six-week study on the book of Romans.

event3.title: Community Outreach
event3.description: Serving our community with free food and family activities.

event4.title: Youth Camp Registration
event4.description: Last chance to register for the summer youth camp.

regular.title: Regular Gatherings
regular.description: Join us for these weekly opportunities to worship, learn, and grow together.

sunday.title: Sunday Worship Service
sunday.description: Our main weekly gathering for worship, teaching, and fellowship.

wednesday.title: Midweek Bible Study
wednesday.description: A deeper dive into Scripture with discussion and prayer.

friday.title: Youth Fellowship
friday.description: Fun, fellowship, and faith development for teenagers.

past.title: Event Gallery
past.description: Memories from our recent church gatherings and celebrations.

calendar.title: Event Calendar
calendar.description: View our full calendar of upcoming events and plan your participation.
calendar.instruction: Click the button below to view our full interactive calendar with all upcoming events.

cta.title: Stay Updated on Church Events
cta.description: Never miss an event! Sign up for our newsletter or contact us for more information about any upcoming gatherings.
